Strengthened by diversity, our district will foster partnerships of staff, families and the community to develop studentsâ educational, physical and social-emotional well-being.

div.a: COVID-19 Care Clinic opened in Prattville

br.p:
BAPTIST HEALTH EXPANDS DRIVE-UP CORONAVIRUS CARE CLINIC WITH PRATTVILLE LOCATION
Prattville, AL- In an effort to prevent further spreading of Coronavirus (COVID-19) activity in the State of Alabama, Baptist Health is pleased to announce the next step of its response plan with the opening of a drive-up Coronavirus Care Clinic in Prattville.

div.div: 153 W 4th Street | Prattville, AL 36067 | Phone: (334) 365-5706 | Fax: (334) 361-3828

p.span: This website endeavors to comply with best practices and standards defined by Section 508 of the U.S. Rehabilitation Act. If you would like additional assistance or have accessibility concerns, please contact webmaster@acboe.net. We are always striving to improve the accessibility standards of our website.
